Amani Lewis (amụrụ n'afọ 1994) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nké bi na Baltimore, Maryland.
Lewis tolitere na Columbia, Maryland. Ha nwetara BFA na Maryland Institute College of Arts na 2016.

Na Septemba, 2019, Lewis gosipụtara Amani Lewis: Subjective Nature na August Wilson African American Cultural Center na Pittsburgh, PA. Ha nwèrè mmasị na ikpe ziri ezi na mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ọrụ ọbọdọ. N'afọ 2019, Lewis gosipụtara ihe ngosi otu akpọrọ: Conjuring Wholeness na De Buck Gallery na New York City. Lewis bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Fountainhead Residency na Studios na Miami, Florida. N'afọ 2020, ha nọ n'otu ihe ngosi akpọrọ: Black Voices/Black Microcosm na CFHILL Art Space na Stockholm, Sweden nke Destinee Ross haziri.
